RESUM E 
PROJECT  
TITTLE               :  Line voltage and Motor Speed Control using PIC controller  
DESCRIPTION  : The objective of this project is to monitor the motor  parameters voltage, and 
speed, Then transmits the monitored parameter to PC with help of ZigBee, The machineries or 
some dangerous places so it is very critical to monitor the motor parameter at the place itself. 
The whole blacks are interfaced with the PIC microcontroller.
